name: Hard We're Off to See the Wizard Quiz / Test | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What state did Dorothy live in?
The title character (The Wizard) was originally written for whom?
What was the real name of the dog 'Toto' (according to information at imdb.com)?
Buddy Ebsen was originally cast as what character?
questions.explanation:
Scarecrow.

	He then switched to the Tin Man character, but had to drop out of because he was allergic to the aluminum powder.

questions.text: Glinda was the Witch of the ________ (which direction)?
When Dorothy meets up with the horses of different colors, how did the producers change the colors of the horses?
questions.explanation:
jello crystals.

	The scenes had to be shot fast because the horses would lick them off.

questions.text: Which of the following directors did NOT direct any portion of 'The Wizard of Oz'?
questions.explanation:
Frank Capra.

	King Vidor and Richard Thorpe both went uncredited, though.

questions.text: What character did Bert Lahr (the Cowardly Lion) play in Kansas?
What is the actual title of the book that 'The Wizard of Oz' was adapted from?
options: Girl Kills, Meets Three Friends, Kills Again
questions.explanation:
The Wonderful Wizard of Oz.

	The movie dropped the 'Wonderful' from the title of the book.

questions.text: What substance killed the Wicked Witch of the West?
